Detailed Description

template<class PTYPE>
class Mutation::Utilities::Config::Factory< PTYPE >

This class stores an archive of available Provider's for a generic polymorphic type PTYPE.

Once registered, they can be accessed by name. This class is originally taken and modified from the VKI CoolFLUID package.
